soroban.title: What is Soroban?
soroban.desc: Soroban is the Japanese abacus with over 400 years of history. Kids learning Soroban can visualize the abacus in their mind and calculate as fast as a calculator without pen and paper.
soroban.benefit1Desc: Activates both left brain (logic) and right brain (visual)
soroban.benefit2Desc: Add/subtract 2-3 digit numbers in seconds, no pen needed
soroban.benefit3Desc: Pay attention to each step, applies to all subjects
soroban.benefit4Desc: Popular in Japan, Korea, China, Malaysia...
soroban.whySubtitle: You don't need to know Soroban to help your kids learn!
soroban.demoDesc: Click on beads to move them up/down

roadmap.subtitle: From zero to calculating as fast as a calculator!

roadmap.step3Desc: Increase speed and accuracy through drills

items.question: Can I cancel anytime?
items.answer: Yes, you can cancel your Premium subscription anytime. Your account will remain active until the end of the billing period.

items.question: What are the free plan limitations?
items.answer: The free plan includes the first 5 lessons and basic exercises. Upgrade to Premium to unlock all content.

items.question: What payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and local payment methods for Vietnam users.
